languages.text: "Одну преступницу я точно вижу — ту, из-за которой мы здесь оказались". {n}Соломон кивком указывает на Джай.{/n} "Пусть ваша спутница приобщается к порядку и смирению, я не стану из-за нее нарушать священный регламент Администратума".

"I can positively identify one criminal — the one who dragged us here." {n}Solomorne nods toward Jae.{/n} "Your companion would do well to learn the value of order and humility — I will not be violating the sacred regulations of the Administratum for her."
languages.original_text: "Одну преступницу я точно вижу — ту, из-за которой мы здесь оказались". {n}Соломон кивком указывает на Джай.{/n} "Пусть ваша спутница приобщается к порядку и смирению, я не стану из-за нее нарушать священный регламент Администратума".

traits.locale_text: "I can positively identify one criminal — the one who dragged us here." {n}Solomorne nods toward Jae.{/n} "Your companion would do well to learn the value of order and humility — I will not be violating the sacred regulations of the Administratum for her."

"I can positively identify one criminal — the one who dragged us here." {n}Solomorne nods toward Jae.{/n} "Your companion would do well to learn the value of order and humility — I will not be violating the sacred regulations of the Administratum for her."

"I can positively identify one criminal — the one who dragged us here." {n}Solomorne nods toward Jae.{/n} "Your companion would do well to learn the value of order and humility — I will not be violating the sacred regulations of the Administratum for her."

"I can positively identify one criminal — the one who dragged us here." {n}Solomorne nods toward Jae.{/n} "Your companion would do well to learn the value of order and humility — I will not be violating the sacred regulations of the Administratum for her."

languages.text: "Ich kann eine Kriminelle identifizieren ... die, die uns hergebracht hat." {n}Solomorne nickt in Jaes Richtung.{/n} "Eure Gefährtin täte gut daran, den Wert von Ordnung und Demut zu lernen ... ich werde die heiligen Bestimmungen des Administratums für sie nicht verletzen."
languages.original_text: "I can positively identify one criminal — the one who dragged us here." {n}Solomorne nods toward Jae.{/n} "Your companion would do well to learn the value of order and humility — I will not be violating the sacred regulations of the Administratum for her."

traits.locale_text: "Ich kann eine Kriminelle identifizieren ... die, die uns hergebracht hat." {n}Solomorne nickt in Jaes Richtung.{/n} "Eure Gefährtin täte gut daran, den Wert von Ordnung und Demut zu lernen ... ich werde die heiligen Bestimmungen des Administratums für sie nicht verletzen."

languages.text: « S'il y a bien une criminelle que je peux identifier sans le moindre doute, c'est celle qui nous a traînés ici, {n}déclare Solomorne en montrant Jae du menton.{/n} Votre compagne ferait bien d'apprendre la valeur de l'ordre et de l'humilité. Il est hors de question que j'enfreigne les régulations sacrées de l'Administratum pour son compte. »
languages.original_text: "I can positively identify one criminal — the one who dragged us here." {n}Solomorne nods toward Jae.{/n} "Your companion would do well to learn the value of order and humility — I will not be violating the sacred regulations of the Administratum for her."

traits.locale_text: « S'il y a bien une criminelle que je peux identifier sans le moindre doute, c'est celle qui nous a traînés ici, {n}déclare Solomorne en montrant Jae du menton.{/n} Votre compagne ferait bien d'apprendre la valeur de l'ordre et de l'humilité. Il est hors de question que j'enfreigne les régulations sacrées de l'Administratum pour son compte. »

languages.text: “我确实发现了一个通缉犯，那就是把我们拖到这里的那个人。”{n}索罗蒙朝婕伊点了点头。{/n}“你的同伴最好能学会秩序与谦逊的意义，我可不打算为了她，违背帝国内政部的神圣规定。”
languages.original_text: "I can positively identify one criminal — the one who dragged us here." {n}Solomorne nods toward Jae.{/n} "Your companion would do well to learn the value of order and humility — I will not be violating the sacred regulations of the Administratum for her."

traits.locale_text: “我确实发现了一个通缉犯，那就是把我们拖到这里的那个人。”{n}索罗蒙朝婕伊点了点头。{/n}“你的同伴最好能学会秩序与谦逊的意义，我可不打算为了她，违背帝国内政部的神圣规定。”

languages.text: «Puedo identificar con seguridad a una criminal: la que nos ha arrastrado hasta aquí». {n}Solomorne hace un gesto en dirección a Jae.{/n} «A su compañera le haría bien aprender el valor del orden y la humildad. No tengo intención de violar las regulaciones sagradas del Administratum por ella».
languages.original_text: "I can positively identify one criminal — the one who dragged us here." {n}Solomorne nods toward Jae.{/n} "Your companion would do well to learn the value of order and humility — I will not be violating the sacred regulations of the Administratum for her."

traits.locale_text: «Puedo identificar con seguridad a una criminal: la que nos ha arrastrado hasta aquí». {n}Solomorne hace un gesto en dirección a Jae.{/n} «A su compañera le haría bien aprender el valor del orden y la humildad. No tengo intención de violar las regulaciones sagradas del Administratum por ella».

languages.text: 「一人の犯罪者は確実に特定できます。私たちをここへ引きずってきた人物です」{n}ソロモーンはジェイの方にうなずいた。{/n}「あなたの仲間は秩序と謙虚さの価値を学ぶべきでしょう。私は彼女のために帝国行政局の聖なる規則を破るつもりはありません」
languages.original_text: "I can positively identify one criminal — the one who dragged us here." {n}Solomorne nods toward Jae.{/n} "Your companion would do well to learn the value of order and humility — I will not be violating the sacred regulations of the Administratum for her."

traits.locale_text: 「一人の犯罪者は確実に特定できます。私たちをここへ引きずってきた人物です」{n}ソロモーンはジェイの方にうなずいた。{/n}「あなたの仲間は秩序と謙虚さの価値を学ぶべきでしょう。私は彼女のために帝国行政局の聖なる規則を破るつもりはありません」

languages.text: "Bir suçluyu kesin olarak teşhis ettim... Bizi buraya sürükleyeni." {n}Solomorne, Jae'a doğru başını eğiyor.{/n} "Yoldaşınız, nizam ve alçakgönüllülük değerlerini öğrense iyi eder. Sırf onun için Administratum'un kutsal yönetmeliklerini ihlal edecek değilim."
languages.original_text: "I can positively identify one criminal — the one who dragged us here." {n}Solomorne nods toward Jae.{/n} "Your companion would do well to learn the value of order and humility — I will not be violating the sacred regulations of the Administratum for her."

traits.locale_text: "Bir suçluyu kesin olarak teşhis ettim... Bizi buraya sürükleyeni." {n}Solomorne, Jae'a doğru başını eğiyor.{/n} "Yoldaşınız, nizam ve alçakgönüllülük değerlerini öğrense iyi eder. Sırf onun için Administratum'un kutsal yönetmeliklerini ihlal edecek değilim."
